text:
I have configured apache with mod_deflate .
When the server send a html document encoding with deflate ,
it dont autorise , the http connection does not persist .

It is normal ? which rfc ?
creator: erwan@mas.nom.fr
jorton@redhat.com
text:
mod_deflate does not affect the use of a persistent connection so I'm not sure
exactly what you're reporting here.  I'd recommend upgrading to 2.0.53 and
asking a user support forum for further help:
http://httpd.apache.org/lists.html#http-users
